author: Talal Ansardeen
comment: Best👍

author: Craig McAhren
comment: One of the best watch faces I've seen.

author: Tommy Kaiser
comment: By FAR my favorite watch face. Had trouble installing it because I'm unfamiliar with Wear 2.0, but I emailed the developer and got a very speedy response. Absolute must have. This developer has several outstanding watch faces that are worth trying, but this is my favorite.

author: Trent Sears
comment: Functional , good options

author: Bill Brown
comment: does not work on samsung gear s3

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. As described on the Play store page in BOLD, it is an Android Wear watch face, not compatible with Tizen (Gear S2/S3). I will be glad to refund you if you send me your order number at thema.apps@gmail.com. Your rating is quite unfair, because it has nothing to do with the watch face. Titanium is available for Gear S2/S3 in the Samsung store.

title: titanium watch face

author: steven wang
comment: Good design with thousand color mix possibility

author: Dougal Miller
comment: Smart interactive watch

author: Steve AndroidPenguin
comment: Got my moto 360 2nd gen last week and lime everyone I installed so many watch faced.  I keep coming back to this one.  I like the style and how I can customize it.    Heart rate and weather on the main face is great.
title: My favorite watch face.

author: Angel Lara
comment: It's a very nice watch face! Although, the start up time lags a bit to fully load my customized watch face. It's understandable it's so much to load but once it's on it's amazing!
title: Very nice

author: Terence Fong
comment: A pretty good looking watchface with great customizations for buttons. I'd like if the big bar in the middle was an option or if there were other options for that look. Otherwise a very nice watchface
title: Very customizable

author: Mohammed Alhuneidi
comment: No problems at all.
title: Work Great on LG G Watch

author: Dave Ives
comment: Best face out there

author: camahoe
comment: Excellent watch face! Would highly recommend to others.

author: David Richards
comment: Great!
title: Everything where I want it!

author: Chris Horka
comment: Well designed
title: Excellent

author: jalaj desai
comment: Nice

author: Joseph Loria
comment: Great design, great options, very usable. If it only had more border colors as other Thema designs do. Still, close to perfect.
title: Nice

author: Günther Wasser
comment: Nice setup possibilities. I like most the custom links that you can place on the watch. Really handy to have my most used apps just a tip a way.
title: Great

author: rifki hendramahdi
comment: One of my favourite

author: Antonio Candido
comment: Excellent.

author: Matthew Long
comment: Great looking face on the LG Urbane. Excellent customisation. Loads of colour schemes. The added ability to add custom shortcuts to apps of your choice is a welcome addition. Good developer, who responds quickly to questions.
title: One of my favourite watch faces.

author: Roman Martinez
comment: 10/10 update. Has every option I would ever want. Great looking and functional. Thank you.
title: Great!

author: Giorgos Papadopoulos
comment: Hi,  Really happy with the watch face BUT: Every morning, steps and temperature values are not updated automatically.  Both values stay unchanged to what they were during the night. I'm setting the watch to airplane mode during the night and after enabling it in the morning nothing happens.  Trying to force a manual update, I changed the watch face and set it back again ...only change is that then steps are 0 and temperature -- degrees! Battery percentage of the mobile is updating, connection has no problem

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Please verify that network data and gps are activated on your mobile. If still not working with those 2 activated, please try to uninstall and install again the watch face. Keep me informed with the results. Edit: did it solve your issue?

author: Beth Yacoub
comment: This watch face has it all and it's not cluttered looking! It's also interactive and there in lies one of the problems. When I press the weather icon it hangs for a second and then gives me an error message. There are only 2 weather choices and none work for me. The other gripe is that we get only 3 hand choices and I don't love any of them but I guess this is a minor prob. Plz fix the weather problem and rethink the hand designs...please...thank you!
title: Almost perfect

author: Tim P
comment: Can we get the "OK Google" function?
title: Just missing one thing

author: Derek Hollier-Day
comment: Very much awesome, I love it, Thema, you're the best
title: Cool and practical

author: Paul Marchant
comment: Great watch face. Really love that you can see the number of unread Gmail and SMS messages.

author: Arijit Sarkar
comment: Good number of customization. Stylish watch face.
title: Stylish

author: Riche Rifkind
comment: A little  bit  bigger,  compared  to Nighthawk screen -  the Moto  360  flat tire cuts  off  bottom.  Please  can  you add Custom  Tags for Timezones mine is weird.  Battery  drain  needs  to  be  fixed. Option  to  remove  seconds  from  second  timezone? or at least  have  it  same  colour  as  rest  of the  text
title: Almost  Perfect

author: Stephen Martell
comment: This did not work for me and I would like a refund. I am not sure how to get one. I have the gear s2 and thought it would be great for it. If the devs are honest they would just give me a refund!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Indeed, and as described on the Play store page, it is an ANDROID WEAR watch face, not compatible with Gear S2. If you are honest too, you will change your rating, because it is quite unfair: this has nothing to do with the watch face. EDIT: I did not receive your refund request. Please send me an email

title: Refund me,  didn't work on gear s2

author: Adrian Cavanagh
comment: Really like this one, looks very crisp on the screen and not over flashy. All reviews come with a but! But... Please can there be an option to remove the digital clock? I can tell the time, don't need pointers!
title: Nice

author: Kevin Jones
comment: Lots of features with interactive dials for every need. Excellent battery usage, but drains quick with seconds hand turned on.
title: My new favorite

author: Joe Mondello Sr.
comment: Great crisp face easy to adjust outstanding design.
title: Cool face

author: Jovelt Jeune
comment: Enjoying it so far on Huawei watch. Tons of customizations.
title: Looking mighty fine

author: Brandon Malina
comment: Amazing battery life

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. What do you mean by not updating? The watch face did not appear on the watch? or are the settings not working? Please send me an email with more details, I will be glad to help fixing your issue

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: Please fix

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Can you be more specific? Please give me a few details, I am sure I can help you with your issue: That's the second watch face you rated 1 star with this comment.

author: Peter DuCharme
comment: Love this app. It has better battery life than the plain watch faces on my LG Watch Urbane plus it does much more.
title: Better battery life

author: Brian Forshaw
comment: Had a problem with initial install. An uninstall and re-download took care of it. Love the options available.
title: My new favorite watchface for my Huawei watch!

author: A Google User
comment: I am loving these interactive faces and this one is a very nice design. However, I have one request. I would like to have a weather interaction option with a 3-5 day forecast.
title: Very nice but one request

author: Stefan Keely
comment: Fantastic design. Looks beautiful on my moto 360.
